name: SIVA GURU K

top_projects.name: Automated-API-Testing-Platform
top_projects.description: An Automated API Testing Platform designed to streamline and automate API testing for Quality Assurance (QA) teams. The platform allows users to create, schedule, and manage API tests, with features for collaborative test management, automated execution, and real-time reporting.

top_projects.name: Curvetopia
top_projects.description: Curvetopia is a project designed to process and analyze curve data using a variety of methods. It provides functionalities for curve regularization, shape detection, symmetry detection, curve completion, and visualization. The project aims to offer a comprehensive toolkit for working with complex curve data and generating insightful visualizations.

top_projects.name: AI-ARTICLE-SUMMARIZER
top_projects.description: This project is a web application built with React, Redux, and integrated with RapidAPI for AI-powered article summarization. The application allows users to input URLs of lengthy articles and generates concise summaries using advanced natural language processing algorithms.

EventDrivenAPI.summary: Recent activities in the EventDrivenAPI repository include a push event on December 22, 2024, where the base setup was completed, indicating progress in the project's initial configuration and setup.

Mall-CRM-Application---Naan-mudhalvan.summary: Activity in the Mall-CRM-Application---Naan-mudhalvan repository included a push event on December 6, 2024, involving an update to the 'nm id', indicating ongoing development and refinement of the application's core components.
